oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Negro League Baseball - Program
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: baseball; Negro League baseball; Memphis Red Sox;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A program from the remembrance ceremony, "More Than Just Baseball" of the Memphis Negro Leagues. The program occurred on September 23, 1994 at the University of Memphis.
